label: A3B_hP8_194_af_c-001
title: ReB$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
The lattice constants $a$ and $c$ were inferred from the nearest-neighbor distances in (Aronsson, 1960). 
 (Frotscher, 2010) states that this structure was ``falsely assigned,'' and that the true structure is \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_hP6_194_f_c-003}{ReB$_{2}$}, which is identical to this structure with the (2a) boron atoms removed.
